description: Cobalt is a tough, lustrous metal known for its role in strong alloys, magnets, and rechargeable batteries. It enhances heat resistance in industrial components and supports long-lasting battery performance. Cobalt compounds produce vibrant blue pigments used in ceramics and glass. In biology, cobalt is part of vitamin B12, essential for cellular function. Though extraction must be managed responsibly, cobalt remains vital for modern technologies.
name: Cobalt
